title: Information about myki auto top up emails
articleContent:
We’re aware of a technical issue causing some customers to have received duplicate email notifications after their myki was topped up via auto top up on Thursday 3 October.

Customers have only been charged for the single auto top up transaction.

We have resolved the issue that caused the duplicate emails. We apologise for any inconvenience.
